projects.name: E-Commerce Site
projects.description: An End to End Online E-commerce site for man to buy and sell cloths. It is completely based on MERN Stack Key Features: Admin Dashboard by which it can create, update and delete product and users. Cart in which we can add, remove and checkout products User can post, update review, update its profile and forget password

projects.name: Restaurant Management System
projects.description: Developed a Restaurant Management System based on MERN stack It is used to place orders in restaurant and by which we can provide offers to our customers. Key Features: Admin Dashboard by which it can create, update, delete and get orders which can also be used to detect wastage of food Customers can place orders, and give ratings or reviews about dishes

projects.name: Bad-Jokes
projects.description: A chrome extension which is based on simple HTML, CSS and Javascript. Key Features: A chrome extension which will fetch a random Joke every time a user Used to add fun while you are working in chrome
